title: Tank Champ
body: I would love to see a tank champ that is a  giant  frog. One of the abilities would have to be a pull/grab with the frog's tongue. A toad looks like it would be a better tank, but as far as I know, it's only frogs that have long tongues...toads have to get close to eat their prey. The frog would have some type of poison that could inflict magic damage with basic attacks. The frog's ultimate could be something like a giant pool of puke that inflicts damage and slows enemy champions. As far as the last ability, I'm not sure. Fogs have such a variety of colors and looks that you can play with. They can also be very deadly.

replies.body: Toads have long tongues too, never fear.

So a frog tank?
https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTznwGR5DVee6c6IEUYrAtW0B_XPkO_AzNL7f0wq1vqLbx2x_tJ
Heres some concept art for you
I've been wanting this way before this guy was developed. It just so happens that they decided to use the same animal.

Okay guys, thanks to your interest, I focused on wrapping up Klaus and updating him on the forums!  [You can find him HERE!](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/9pN0OEb7-klaus-the-jovial-chameleon)
Nice, I would love to see how that comes out.

I actually have a champion concept similar to this, but he's a chameleon named Klaus.  I haven't uploaded him to the forums yet, but maybe I will work on him soon so you can see.  He has a tongue lash, poisonous saliva and he changes colors based on the type of damage he's receiving!

That sounds cool; I'd like to see that as well when you've uploaded that concept.
